name: Comeuppance
effect: This Move can only deal damage if a Foe has dealt any sort of Damage to the User this Round. Roll the same Damage Pool as the last Foe who hit, plus 2 Extra Dice. Ignore the foe's Defenses.
description: The Pok√©mon channels karmatic energy, before retaliating with much greater force against the opponent that last inflicted damage on it. They always get their comuppance.
